Package demo

package demo
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameBase
    This is the base for other demos, it does not have a main() method, you can not run it directly.
    JumpExample1
    Example using a "jumping" with a FlyingElement.
    JumpExample2
    Uses a FlyingElement to jump on a FollowerElement and an AttachedElement associated with a PlatformElement.
    MazeExample
    Using some BasicElements and a MovingElement to create a player in a maze.
    PigsExample
    Example of using an ImageRenderer with a BasicElement.
    PlatformExample
    No controls, just a cool animation.
    SuperPigsExample
    Demo of pretty much all the game elements in hw4.
    VanishingElementExample
    Example of using VanishingElement.
    WhenPigsFly
    An attempt to experiment with the mechanics of the lovely game "Winter Bells" http://www.freewebarcade.com/game/winterbells/ Side-to-side motion of player is controlled by mouse.
